pages.text: Ta ya proslidkuvav zamistʹ tsʹoho relihiya moyikh predkiv, Abraham, Isaac, ta Jacob. My nikoly ne vstanovlyuyemo budʹ-yakykh idoliv bilya BOHA. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu blahoslovennya z BOHA na nas ta na lyudey, ale naybilʹsh lyudy unappreciative
O moyi tovaryshi tyurmy, dekilʹka bohiv krashche, abo BOH vyklyuchno,, Vyshchyy

Vy ne obozhnyuyete bilya Yoho krim novovvedenʹ shcho vy zahrymuvalysʹ, vy ta vashi batʹky. BOH nikoly ne upovnovazhyv takykh idoliv. Vsya postanova nalezhytʹ BOHU, ta Vin panuvav shcho vy ne budete obozhnyuvaty krim Yoho. Tse yavlyaye soboyu doskonalu relihiyu, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne znayutʹ
O moyi tovaryshi tyurmy, odniyeyi z vy budete vyno butler dlya yoho lorda, v toy chas, yak inshoho bude crucified - ptakhy z'yidyatʹ z yoho holovy. Tse ulahodzhuye materiyu pro kotru vy dovidalysya
Vin todi skazav shchob buty vryatovanyy "Zapam'yatayutʹ meni u vashomu lordi." Otzhe, chort vyklykav yoho zabuty yoho Lorda, ta, otzhe, vin zalyshyvsya u tyurmi nechyslennykh bilʹshe rokiv

korolʹ skazav, "ya pobachyv semy zhyrnykh koriv pohlynalysʹ sʹoma skinny korovamy, ta sʹoma zelenymy spikes (pshenytsi), ta inshi shriveled. O miy elders, radyte meni vidnosno moyeyi mriyi, yakshcho vy znayete yak interpretuvaty sny
